("" (skosimp)

("" (skosimp)
 (("" (lemma "bv2int_topbit[N]")

       (("" (inst - "bv1!1 + bv2!1")
         ((""
           (case "bv2int(bv1!1 + bv2!1) = bv2int(bv1!1) + bv2int(bv2!1) + 2* exp2(N) * b2n(bv1!1(N - 1)) - exp2(N)")
           (("1" (replace -1)
             (("1" (hide -1)
               (("1" (expand* "^" "b2n")
                 (("1" (lift-if)

            ("2" (hide -1 -2 -5)
